text:
Dears,
here is the link for the coming meeting
*Friday 21st of July (in a few days!) at 3:00 pm (UK time – GMT+1) !*
<https://crick.zoom.us/j/63638716548?pwd=L0RncnNXcXI1aHNOaHJHRnRYaUZGQT09>
Meeting ID: 636 3871 6548
Passcode: 421625
Preliminary agenda is
•	welcome + news about Wildsheet
•	"Lattice Lightsheet User Meeting 2023: a quick report" kindly offered by Helena Coker (University of Oxford - UK)
•	"The BBC-fully cleared mouse (threads above..) : a short JC "  from Alessandro Ciccarelli (The Crick – UK)  (only if we have time...)
•	hot news/in person meetings for the light-sheet world ?

Note: if you have short topic to present (15`), we are happy to find space for you (just let us know by Thursday! )
Hope to see you on the screen,
Alessandro
 (on behalf of the Wildsheet-org)
